00023 class PVModification {
00024 private:
00031      static std::map<int, int> sPVTypeMap;
00032 
00034      int mPV;
00035 
00037      EthnicFaction* mFaction;
00038 
00040      double mValue;
00041 
00042 public:
00044      enum ePVType {eSum, eMean, eUnknown};
00045 
00053      PVModification(int pv, EthnicFaction& faction, double value) : mPV(pv), mFaction(&faction), mValue(value) {}
00054 
00060      int pv() const { return mPV; }
00061 
00067      EthnicFaction& faction() const { return *mFaction; }
00068 
00074      double value() const { return mValue; }
00075 
00082      int type() const { return type(mPV); }
00083 
00084      static int type(int t);     
00085 };
00086 
00093 inline int PVModification::type(int t)
00094 {
00095      static bool firstTime = true;
00096      if (firstTime) {
00097           sPVTypeMap[eAllPopulation          ] = eSum;
00098           sPVTypeMap[eAllDisplaced           ] = eSum;
00099           sPVTypeMap[eAllSheltered           ] = eSum;
00100           sPVTypeMap[eAllProtected           ] = eSum;
00101           sPVTypeMap[eAllInsurgents          ] = eSum;
00102           sPVTypeMap[eAllSuppliedWater       ] = eSum;
00103           sPVTypeMap[eAllDailyDead           ] = eSum;
00104           sPVTypeMap[eAllTotalDead           ] = eSum;
00105           sPVTypeMap[eAllViolence            ] = eMean;
00106           sPVTypeMap[eAllPerceivedThreat     ] = eMean;
00107           sPVTypeMap[eAllFractionNoMedical   ] = eMean;
00108           sPVTypeMap[eAllFractionNoWork      ] = eMean;
00109           sPVTypeMap[eAllEthnicTension       ] = eMean;
00110           sPVTypeMap[eAllFractionCrimeVictims] = eMean;
00111           sPVTypeMap[eAllFoodDays            ] = eMean;
00112           sPVTypeMap[eAllFractionNoFood      ] = eMean;
00113           sPVTypeMap[eAllWaterDays           ] = eMean;
00114           sPVTypeMap[eAllFractionNoWater     ] = eMean;
00115           sPVTypeMap[eAllFractionInfected    ] = eMean;
00116           sPVTypeMap[eAllFractionRecovered   ] = eMean;
00117           sPVTypeMap[eAllInfrastructure      ] = eMean;
00118      }
00119      std::map<int, int>::iterator it = sPVTypeMap.find(t);
00120      return (it == sPVTypeMap.end() ? eUnknown : it->second);
00121 }
